meanings.sent1: The yogis in the class showed great flexibility.
meanings.sent2: Many yogis gather in the park for morning yoga sessions.
meanings.sent3: The yogis tried to balance on one leg but ended up falling comically.
meanings.sent4: The group of yogis moved gracefully like swans during their yoga practice.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the peaceful smiles of the yogis in the yoga studio.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of yogis meditating under the tree.
meanings.sent2: The yogis traveled to India to deepen their yoga practice.
meanings.sent3: The yogis decided to have a picnic instead of meditating today.
meanings.sent4: The yogis stood tall and strong like ancient trees in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The colorful robes of the yogis brightened up the yoga retreat.
